summary: This is an email chain between court personnel regarding the transmission of a sealed warrant signed by Judge Smith in the Southern District of New York. It includes an attachment with a case number and references a forthcoming charging document.

persons.name: Danny Ortiz
persons.context: Court official at the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York who forwarded an email about a sealed warrant.

persons.name: Jim Molinelli
persons.context: Sender of the original email transmitting a copy of a sealed warrant signed by Judge Smith and mentioning a forthcoming charging document.

persons.name: Judge Smith
persons.context: Judge who signed the sealed warrant referenced in the email correspondence.

connections.description: Colleagues within the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, with Molinelli transmitting a sealed warrant to Ortiz.
Judge Smith signed the warrant that court personnel Jim Molinelli is transmitting.

events.title: Transmission of Sealed Warrant
events.description: Court personnel transmit a copy of a sealed warrant signed by Judge Smith, referencing a forthcoming charging document.

locations: United States District Court Southern District of New York, 500 Pearl Street, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A sealed warrant was signed by Judge Smith in the Southern District of New York.
The document transmission occurred on June 29, 2020, between court personnel.
The correspondence references a forthcoming numbered charging document (EFTA00073436).
The warrant and related documents are part of a case with a specific SDNY case number.
The communication highlights procedural steps in handling sealed legal documents in a federal court.
